title: panic: leveldb: not found

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
May be related to #479 although the file that was giving the problem I renamed in case there was some special character. Been getting this occasionally since at least v0.9.11 since that's the first panic log I have. It's not as predictable though. Sometimes the whole night it will be fine others it will do it within minutes.
